english.segment1: She's now my new sun. She don't speak but somehow calls me.
english.segment2: Automated exchanges make us not lovers, But feigners, we are only strangers.
english.segment3: Not estranged to regret, Not estranged to what follows our faulty steps.
english.segment4: Ocean tides move to the voice of the moon, Strange how we move. How strange that I move to the voice of the moon, Love ringing out of tune.
english.segment5: Regret once kept me from her door, But every time wore off more and more. So now we're back here, Playing sincere with a new set of bones. We are strange.
english.segment6: Not estranged to regret. Not estranged to what follows our faulty steps.
english.segment7: Ocean tides move to the voice of the moon, Strange how we move. How strange that I move to the voice of the moon, Love ringing out of tune.
english.segment8: Leave your bad limbs behind, For they are conduits to the heart.
